channel.title: How to make your Computer Fast! FOR FREE!
channel.description:
[center]For fast web browsing I recommend the fastest, [b]Opera[/b] [url=http://www.opera.com/browser/]click here[/url] for download. No it's not IE9, Mozilla Firefox, Chrome, or even safari, It is Opera, I have used all browsers and this is the safest and fastest, It has widgets(like a android) the tab page is customizable with different pages, it has its own anti-virus and will warn you if a virus was detected and it will protect you from that.
Now for anti-virus, [b]SUPERAntiSpyware[/b] [url=http://www.superantispyware.com/downloadfile.html?productid=SUPERANTISPYWAREFREE]click here[/url] for download. It not only protects you for free, but it is better than some anti-virus's you have to pay for! It's not avast, or AVG, but it's better! Trust me I have tested all 3 and other non popular ones and SUPERAntiSpyware is the best, it cleans everything for you and is easy to set up!
Now for a Defragger, [b]Smart Defrag[/b], [url=http://dw.com.com/redir?edId=3&siteId=4&oId=3000-2094_4-10759533&ontId=2094_4&spi=da903909a66b318e45ae6f60918d1241&lop=link&tag=tdw_dltext&ltype=dl_dlnow&pid=12328430&mfgId=6271865&merId=6271865&pguid=T3JYLAoOYJMAAA5AnHEAAAJk&destUrl=http%3A%2F%2Fdownload.cnet.com%2F3001-2094_4-10759533.html%3Fspi%3Dda903909a66b318e45ae6f60918d1241]click here[/url] for download. With this utility you can quickly analyze your hard drive to check the level of defragmentation before committing to a scan. The interface shows you different colored blocks representing fragmented files, frequently used files, and more, with a helpful key to show what each colored block represents. When you're ready to pull the trigger, you can choose from a straight defragmentation (fastest), or have Smart Defrag perform either a fast or "deep" optimization after defragmentation. Oh ya did I mention it's FREE?!
Now for a program that cleans your files, cookies, your history, pretty much eliminates the things you don't need to improve your performance.[b] CCleaner[/b] [url=http://www.piriform.com/ccleaner/download]click here[/url] to download. It's a small program that does enough to give you that extra boost! I recommend this if you want to quickly do a sweep to give a performance boost.
Now for the gamer, [b]IObit Game Booster[/b] [url=http://dw.com.com/redir?edId=3&siteId=4&oId=3000-18512_4-10913645&ontId=18512_4&spi=03814b05279d6b1e6a73824cf0001327&lop=link&tag=tdw_dltext&ltype=dl_dlnow&pid=12445840&mfgId=6271865&merId=6271865&pguid=T3JZYAoOYJIAAHal2F0AAAEl&destUrl=http%3A%2F%2Fdownload.cnet.com%2F3001-18512_4-10913645.html%3Fspi%3D03814b05279d6b1e6a73824cf0001327]click here[/url] to download. Pretty much what this program does is it shuts down all unnecessary programs that are slowing your computer down, All you do is add the game by dragging it to the programs window and clicking boost & launch or just use the direct boost button and click a game to start, such as web browser games.
Well guys hopefully these few programs will increase your performance.
To test this before you download any program, use http://speedtest.net and test your speed then use the programs and test your speed, and See the difference![/center]

item.title: How to make your Computer Fast! FOR FREE!
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:27, topic:437680”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=540383.msg3958023#msg3958023 date=1332967844]
Does CCleaner actually do… anything…?
[/quote]CCleaner is the ONLY item on here I honestly would suggest to anybody. It helps to delete useless cookies etc. If you want a “fairly” safe environment this is what I personally suggest

-Spybot search & destroy
-comodo firewall ( not the best out there but still better than the regular windows defender. )
-Malwarebytes/Spy Doctor/Avast take your pick brah
-cccleaner

  • get either mcafee site advisor (horrible speller lol) OR use that site that checks all urls etc for malicious content…don’t remember name of it at the moment.[/quote]
    SPYBOT FTWWWWWW

Read full topic
item.source: How to make your Computer Fast! FOR FREE!

item.description:

item.title: How to make your Computer Fast! FOR FREE!
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:25, topic:437680”][quote author=Wet Dreamss link=topic=540383.msg3958020#msg3958020 date=1332967797]

S’all lies

Your GPU is pretty low end, and define ‘maxing out FPS’, as that makes little sense.

League of Legends: Max frames per second = 65, I pull off 60-62
Runescape: Idk the max fps but I pull 45ish
Cod: Idk the max again but I get about 80
Maxing out FPS = You get the most Frames Per Second available, I could of worded it a little better.
[/quote]
There’s only a max if you enable vsync.[/quote]
:|, well I shall reword my statement again. The maximum Fps most players will ever get without a super computer. x)

Read full topic

item.title: How to make your Computer Fast! FOR FREE!
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:19, topic:437680”][quote author=Wet Dreamss link=topic=540383.msg3957841#msg3957841 date=1332949948]
I have a better solution: Buy a decent computer and don’t watch porn on it…

I just bought a new 700$ laptop and it’s specs are
6 GB RAM
1 TB HD
3.60 GHz
AMD Raedon 6350D graphics card
Quad-core processor

I get the maximum FPS in pretty much every game except Runescape.

/Problem Solved.
[/quote]
Obviously haven’t played many modern games.[/quote]
League of legends, MW3, MW2, Far Cry, Mass Effect, and a game called Flyff (private server edition)

All games I play on that one laptop. Some are modern some aren’t but it’s a brand new laptop and I’m maxing out FPS on most of them.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make your Computer Fast! FOR FREE!
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“DubbinStep, post:17, topic:437680”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=540383.msg3957838#msg3957838 date=1332949648]
What is this…
[/quote]

It’s people being assholes to a person who spent 30 minutes to help people improve their computer…[/quote]

  1. A “better” web browser doesn’t make you’re computer faster
  2. Any OS comes with a defragmentor(however you spell it.)
  3. Anybody can find a virus scanner in 30 seconds with GOOGLE
  4. If you really wanna boost your gameplay you can hit crtl + alt +del and go to processes and end the processes that you currently aren’t using, then change the Games priority to High/Realtime.

Point: This isn’t necessary.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make your Computer Fast! FOR FREE!
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“Dunder Mifflin, post:10, topic:437680”][quote author=eyeownyew link=topic=540383.msg3957417#msg3957417 date=1332895000]

Well guys hopefully these few programs will increase your performance, please rep+ if you liked or helped you.

To test this before you download any program, use http://speedtest.net and test your speed then use the programs and test your speed, and See the difference!

How is your network speed related to your computer performance?

Commonly, computers that have previously had viruses have buffer problems. This causes a serious decrease in speed; so these methods will only be effective IF your system was flawed originally.
[/quote]

so even if i remove a virus it still hurts my streaming of video?!?!?[/quote]
Not usually. It’s most commonly an error in Windows programming (which there are many of). In rare cases, when the virus is not actually fully resolved, there are backdoors everywhere and it causes networking problems.

Read full topic
